name: This Isn't Mario
description:
This is a small, 3 level, platformer that I made to help myself learn more of the Unity systems and programming. There isn't anything ground breaking about it. 

Hop on enemies to kill them. Some enemies give powerups that you can use for a shot time. Collect coins. Hop over gaps. Don't die. :)

*Note* You will have to bear with me and the graphical glitches that seem to be happening on my levels and the tilesets. From what I can find and what everything keeps pointing to is the fact that my assets weren't either done right, or put into my tilesets correctly. I have tried every non-redesigning the sprite sheets, which I don't even know how to do.
